snippet.title: Learn more about Fretless' music with its composers
snippet.description:
Fretless' combat system is centered around music: guitars are weapons, and melody is power! As you choose your instrument, you'll have to select your favorite riffs to defeat your enemies in awesome music battles. 

How does it work behind the scenes? How do you create music-centered combats that are exciting to hear and interesting to play? 

Fretless' music composers Jeff and Jeff have produced an audio deep-dive explaining the game's particular battle system and how music is created. Discover everything from the tools they use to their musical influences in this video! 

And don't forget to wishlist the game now on Steam: https://bit.ly/Fretless-Game
